rel.why: MANIFEST is the authoritative index for the docs/specs system.
Decisions Log governs documentation + architecture decision workflow.
_tree_app.txt is a raw capture artifact used to derive A00 routing inventory.
_tree_components.txt is a raw capture artifact used to derive B00 components inventory.
_tree_lib.txt is a raw capture artifact used to derive B01 lib inventory.

notes: docs/specs is the authoritative spec store (paired .md + .tok.json).
_tree_*.txt files are raw capture artifacts retained as evidence/source inputs for the as-is inventories.
